author: pia angeli Gagarin
comment: It is costly. Only two budget entry is available. 155 php per month is too much a cost for an app that tracks money. I would opt to use excel and make all the formulas to balance check everything for free. Thanks anyway.

reply.author: MobillsLabs
reply.content:
Hi Pia, how are you doing?

To maintain the quality of the application with the best tools and features to help you reach your financial freedom there is a lot of expense. Could you send your doubts and suggestions for our support? suporte@mobills.com.br 

I remain pending!

author: Felipe Machado
comment: Good app in free version, but after going to premium I'm not happy. One of the main reasons for premium is to use the filter by tag in order to calculate some expenses, but this filter is always missing some items. No matter how many times I edit the missing itens and re-search, it is always missing some and not closing the math. For a finance application, not doing math right is a totally no go.

reply.author: MobillsLabs
reply.content:
Hello Felipe!
Can you send us an email to give you more support? suporte@mobills.com.br, we want to help you!
Also, you can send in portuguese (BR) if you want, Mobills are based in Brazil.

author: Irenne Bautista
comment: This is not user friendly at all. No instructions, no step by step, and I don't have time to go back and forth on an email. you should add a guide/instructions,  something to help your users out like other budget apps.

reply.author: MobillsLabs
reply.content: Hi Irenne, We're sorry about your bad experience on our app, we have an email for support support@mobills.com.br so there you can get more help. - Mobills Team

author: Adam Whitehouse
comment: I have trialed a few of these and this one is by far the simplest to understand and use. I love the budget function so you can track how much you are spending on certain things outside of your normal bills. Intuitive to use although it is the 'recurring' expense you want to use for monthly bills, not repeat. Great app. Love it.

author: abdul a
comment: The app crashed when trying to export a CSV report. PDF and XLS options don't seem to work at all.

reply.author: MobillsLabs
reply.content:
Hi Abdul, how are you doing?

To help you, could you send all the details of your challenges with the application for our support? suporte@mobills.com.br

I remain pending!

author: Christina Williams
comment: Easy to use once you poke around and see what's where. Nice colors, not intimidating to use. Not as scared to look at my Bills now LOL

author: Paul Lewis
comment: First off, I don't care if you've been around 20 years and were the 1st app in the app store? When you start by making something that manages people's MONEY, and we see so much violation of the review system with so many falsely padded reviews, it's a clear sign that you aren't trustworthy people!! HELLO??? All I see are predominantly 1-4 star reviews, yet you have 150k 5 star reviews that ridiculouly overshadows the others and is clearly not reasonable or possible! When I mention it, you defend this? And you want us to trust you? From Brazil??? Yeah right!! ROFL!!! As for the app itself, I picked this up and started setup but couldn't finish because it needed much time, so I had to put it down. Coming back to it, now I'm confused what to do. It needs easy access instructions or setup tutorial. Very cumbersome, not intuitive to use or understand, and mostly found myself fighting with it before realizing it's not worth the aggravation. After that, I'm still not using an app with mostly fake and padded 5 star reviews. It just doesn't instill trust. This isn't a simple game! Doing this also takes the rating system out of user's hands and negates the one and only feature that we have! Thanks!! I don't trust someone who doesn't have my best interest at heart, uses a questionable mindset and tactics to promote their product, then wants access to my finances or my information. Get right with yourself!!

reply.author: MobillsLabs
reply.content:
Hi Paul,

I'm sorry about your experience, but Mobills has about 1 mi. downloads and 4 years of existence on Google Play, and we have real cases of success of people that use the app to control finances and organize accounts.

Can you send us an email to support@mobills.com.br? So we can give more support and improve your experience.

author: Lucas Rocha
comment: Excelente!!! Além de atender a várias necessidades particulares que possuo, como controle em cartão de crédito e contas out balance, o suporte funciona!!! Fui muito bem atendido. Fora que tenho o controle na palma da mão (literalmente). Estou obtendo sucesso nas minhas finanças.
